name: Role Manager

notes.short: Assign roles to devices on JACDAC bus.

packets.name: status_code
packets.description:
Reports the current state or error status of the device. ``code`` is a standardized value from 
the JACDAC error codes. ``vendor_code`` is any vendor specific error code describing the device
state. This report is typically not queried, when a device has an error, it will typically
add this report in frame along with the anounce packet.

packets.name: all_roles_allocated
packets.description: Indicates if all required roles have been allocated to devices.

packets.name: get_role
packets.description: Get the role corresponding to given device identifer. Returns empty string if unset.

packets.name: get_role
packets.description: Get the role corresponding to given device identifer. Returns empty string if unset.

packets.name: set_role
packets.description: Set role. Can set to empty to remove role binding.

packets.name: list_required_roles
packets.description: List all roles required by the current program. `device_id` is `0` if role is unbound.

packets.name: required_roles
packets.description: List all roles required by the current program. `device_id` is `0` if role is unbound.

packets.name: change
packets.description: Emit notifying that the internal state of the service changed.
